title: Terry Butler (rugby league)
text: Terry Butler (22 April 1958 – 4 October 2016) was an Australian professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer. He played for <a href="Wynnum-Manly%20Seagulls">Wynnum-Manly Seagulls</a> in the <a href="Brisbane%20Rugby%20League">Brisbane Rugby League</a> premiership's grand final victory in 1982 as a winger, scoring the first try of the match. The following year he was selected to represent Queensland in Game II of the <a href="1983%20State%20of%20Origin%20series">1983 State of Origin series</a>. He later had an uneventful year with the <a href="North%20Sydney%20Bears">North Sydney Bears</a> in the <a href="New%20South%20Wales%20Rugby%20League">New South Wales Rugby League</a> competition in 1986. He died aged 58 of cancer in 2016.
